events.message: I recently purchased a jacket that unfortunately does not fit me properly and I would like to request a refund for the item.
The issue has been classified as a Refund request due to customer's dissatisfaction with the product size.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle the refund case for the returned jacket issue.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm happy to assist you with your refund request for the jacket.
Could you please provide the order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in its original packaging?
Sure, the order number is 8745123. The jacket is unworn and still in the original sealed packaging.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate the refund immediately once we receive the returned jacket at our facility.
Great, thanks for the quick response. I'll send the jacket back today and expect the refund soon.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should appear in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just following up to ensure you have received your refund. Please let us know if there's anything else we can assist you with.
Since your refund has been completed and there are no further issues, we are closing this customer service case now. Thank you!
Please take a moment to fill out our satisfaction survey to help us improve our service in the future.
